panel.title: DNS Packet Size Distribution By Host (Today)

chart.title: Look for High number of same-sized DNS requests from an internal host

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Network_Resolution WHERE DNS.message_type="Query" GROUPBY DNS.query, DNS.src | `drop_dm_object_name("DNS")` `clean_dns_query("query")` | eval Length=len(query) | convert num(Length) | stats count by Length, src | sort -Length, count | reverse | table src Length count | head 1000

panel.title: Top 10 DNS Requests By Internal Clients per Hour

chart.title: Look for High number of DNS requests occurring from a particular client

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` prestats=t count FROM datamodel=Network_Resolution WHERE DNS.message_type="Query" GROUPBY _time, DNS.src | `drop_dm_object_name("DNS")` | timechart span=1h limit=10 usenull=f useother=f count AS Requests by src

chart.title: Look for High Counts and Low Variance (i.e Consistent beaconing every x Seconds)

search.query: index=msad sourcetype=MSAD:NT5:DNS NOT query="*microsoft*" NOT query="*amazon*" NOT query="*bing*" NOT query="*skype*" NOT query="*bbc*" NOT query="*elasticsearch*" NOT query="*yammer*" NOT query="*nexus*" NOT query="*google*" NOT query="*facebook*" NOT query="*office*" NOT query="*ucas*" NOT query="*salesforce*" NOT query="*sophos*" | fields _time, query `clean_dns_query("query")` | streamstats current=f last(_time) as next_time by query | eval gap=next_time - _time | stats count avg(gap) AS AverageBeaconTime var(gap) AS VarianceBeaconTime BY query | sort -count | where VarianceBeaconTime < 60 AND count > 2 AND AverageBeaconTime>1.0 | table query VarianceBeaconTime count AverageBeaconTime

panel.title: Beaconing Activity By Domain Last 7 days (Click Query for Domain Dossier)

table.title: Look for High Count, small variance and possibly rounded Averages (i.e every 60 seconds etc)

search.query: index=msad sourcetype=MSAD:NT5:DNS message_type="Query" NOT query="*microsoft*" NOT query="*amazon*" NOT query="*bing*" NOT query="*skype*" NOT query="*bbc*" NOT query="*elasticsearch*" NOT query="*yammer*" NOT query="*nexus*" NOT query="*google*" NOT query="*facebook*" NOT query="*office*" NOT query="*ucas*" NOT query="*salesforce*" NOT query="*sophos*" `clean_dns_query("query")` | fields _time, src, query | streamstats current=f last(_time) as next_time by query | eval gap=next_time - _time | stats count dc(src) AS NumHosts avg(gap) AS AverageBeaconTime var(gap) AS VarianceBeaconTime BY query | sort -count | where VarianceBeaconTime < 60 AND AverageBeaconTime > 0

panel.title: Domains with High Number of sub domains (Click for Domain Dossier)

table.title: Can be indicative of random or DGA domains

search.query: index=msad sourcetype=MSAD:NT5:DNS NOT query="*microsoft*" NOT query="*amazon*" NOT query="*bing*" NOT query="*skype*" NOT query="*bbc*" NOT query="*elasticsearch*" NOT query="*yammer*" NOT query="*nexus*" NOT query="*google*" NOT query="*facebook*" NOT query="*office*" NOT query="*ucas*" NOT query="*salesforce*" NOT query="*sophos*" `clean_dns_query("query")` | rex field=query "(?P<AAA>.*?)\.(net|co\.uk|com|co|org|arpa)$" | rex field=AAA "\.?(?<rest>[^\.]*)$"| eval pos = if(length(rest) > 0, length(AAA) - length(rest), -1) | eval Host=substr(AAA,0,pos-1)| eval DomainName=substr(query,pos+1,len(query)) | stats dc(Host) AS HostsPerDomain BY DomainName | sort - HostsPerDomain

chart.title: Look for Spikes or sudden changes by Type

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` prestats=t count FROM datamodel=Network_Resolution GROUPBY _time, DNS.record_type | `drop_dm_object_name("DNS")` | timechart span=1h count BY record_type

panel.title: Number of DNS lookups by Client (Deviation from Norm )

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` prestats=t count FROM datamodel=Network_Resolution WHERE DNS.message_type="Query" GROUPBY _time, DNS.src | `drop_dm_object_name("DNS")` | bucket _time span=1h | stats count as NumDNSLookups by src, _time | stats count AS NumOfDNSLookups avg(NumDNSLookups) as avg stdev(NumDNSLookups) as stdev latest(NumDNSLookups) as latest by src | eval z_score = round(abs(avg - latest)/max(stdev,0.1),2) | sort - z_score | WHERE z_score>0 | table src latest z_score stdev | rename latest AS "Domains Queried"

panel.title: Clients Contacting More Distinct Domains Names (Deviation from Norm)

search.query: index=msad sourcetype=MSAD:NT5:DNS message_type="Query" NOT query="*microsoft*" NOT query="*amazon*" NOT query="*bing*" NOT query="*skype*" NOT query="*bbc*" NOT query="*elasticsearch*" NOT query="*yammer*" NOT query="*nexus*" NOT query="*google*" NOT query="*facebook*" NOT query="*office*" NOT query="*ucas*" NOT query="*salesforce*" NOT query="*sophos*" | fields query, src, _time | bucket _time span=1h |stats dc(query) as NumDomains by src, _time | stats count avg(NumDomains) as avg stdev(NumDomains) as stdev latest(NumDomains) as latest by src | eval z_score = round(abs(avg - latest)/max(stdev,0.1),2) | sort - z_score

panel.title: Total Number of Domains Queried By Client (Deviation from Norm)

search.query: index=msad sourcetype=MSAD:NT5:DNS message_type="Query" NOT query="*microsoft*" NOT query="*amazon*" NOT query="*bing*" NOT query="*skype*" NOT query="*bbc*" NOT query="*elasticsearch*" NOT query="*yammer*" NOT query="*nexus*" NOT query="*google*" NOT query="*facebook*" NOT query="*office*" NOT query="*ucas*" NOT query="*salesforce*" NOT query="*sophos*" | fields _time, src | bucket _time span=1h | stats count as NumDNSLookups by src, _time | stats count AS NumOfDNSLookups avg(NumDNSLookups) as avg stdev(NumDNSLookups) as stdev latest(NumDNSLookups) as latest by src | eval z_score = round(abs(avg - latest)/max(stdev,0.1),2) | sort - z_score | search z_score > 0 | rename latest AS "Domains Queried"
